name: Furious Smash
desc: Unit releases their rage and adds +1 ATK, +5 Hit/Crit, -5 Dodge per stack.
components: len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'RageChild'])
5*(len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'RageChild']) )
5*(len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'RageChild']) )
-5*(len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'RageChild']) )
